actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide a lower limit on penalties for the discharge of hazardous substances.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to lower the limit on penalties for the discharge of oil and hazardous substances into or upon waters of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide a lower limit on penalties for the discharge of hazardous substances.
